Question: In 1965, the Beatles released the ____ composition "Yesterday", featuring a string quartet.
Hints: In 1990, the IAU's Minor Planet Center named the planet 4148, "this person" in his honour.
Their fans' hysteria became known as "Beatlemania", and the press sometimes referred to this person as the "cute Beatle".
As of 2013[update], this person remains one of the world's top draws.
